articles.title: Kim Jong Un Orders to Confer Rank of General upon Choe Pu Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Orders to Confer Rank of General upon Choe Pu Il
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un Monday ordered to confer the military rank of general upon Choe Pu Il, minister of People's Security.
					 According to the order, the organ of the people's security and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) together with the Korean People's Army constitute armed groups which play the role of two mainstays of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The people's security persons and service personnel of the KPISF have performed great feats to go down in the history of the country by displaying boundless devotion and self-sacrificing spirit in the sacred struggle to protect the party, social system and people in the days of glory and ordeals under the uplifted banner of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 The prevailing situation urgently requires the people's security organ and the KPISF, revolutionary armed forces of the Workers' Party of Korea, to defend the socialist system as firm as an iron wall and reliably guarantee the party's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force with arms and by law.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed belief that all service persons of the people's security organ and the KPISF would creditably perform their honorable mission and duty as the first-line soldiers protecting the socialist system, remaining loyal to the leadership of the party.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Ore and Coal Mines
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Ore and Coal Mines
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju made field surveys of the Toksong Mine and the Kumya Youth Coal Mine in South Hamgyong Province.
					 Touring open-cast cutting site, dressing plant, coal carriage shop and other places of the ore and coal mines, the premier learned in detail about the ore and coal deposit, mining conditions and equipment operation. He held consultative meetings.
					
					 The meetings underscored the need for the relevant units to satisfactorily supply raw and other materials and electricity as required by the important duties to be performed by the ore and coal mines in economic construction and improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 They took measures for transporting greater quantities of concentrated ore and coal in good time and raising the operation rate of rolling stock by reinforcing the strength of railroads and cutting down the turnround time of freight wagons.
					
					 Recalling that the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un called for ushering in a new heyday on all fronts for socialist construction by creating the "Masikryong Speed," the premier urged the officials of the relevant units to scrupulously organize and command operations and give full play to the mental power of the workers to boost production.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Tuesday on the occasion of the national day.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ju Jae Dok, vice-minister of Railways, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of different countries and staff members of international organizations here.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Russian embassy.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee led by Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports and chairman of the committee, left here Tuesday to take part in the extraordinary general assembly of the Association of National Olympic Committees to be held in Lausanne, Switzerland. 
					 Meanwhile, the delegation of officials in charge of foreign affairs of the Korean People's Army led by KPA Maj. General An Yong Gi left here on the same day to visit Vietnam.

articles.title: KPA Servicepersons Make Study Tour of Revolutionary Sites
articles.content:
KPA Servicepersons Make Study Tour of Revolutionary Sites
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) started the study tour of major battle sites in the period of war and revolutionary sites on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The march group is to visit revolutionary sites of the front area associated with the immortal leadership exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and major battle sites including Height 351 and Mt. Jihye.
					
					 A meeting for announcing the start of the study tour to the revolutionary sites in the eastern sector of the front was held in Kosong County, Kangwon Province.
					
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and marchers.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before an art work depicting the great persons of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute.
					
					 A flag of the march group was conveyed to the group.
					
					 The group marched to Height 351 fluttering the flags of the Supreme Commander, the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and the group.
					
					 Servicepersons, their families and other people warmly saw the marchers off.

articles.title: DPRK's Pianist Proves Successful in Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
articles.content:
DPRK's Pianist Proves Successful in Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK student Yu Pyol Mi took a special place at the 10th Safonov International Juvenile Piano Concours held in Patsigorsk City, Stavropol Territory, Russia between June 1 and 5.
					 The concours brought together 68 excellent young pianists from at least 30 cities of different countries and regions.
					
					 It was divided into three groups according to ages. Competitors had to pass the first and second phases.
					
					 Yu, who belonged to the second group, successfully played a series of "Arirang", Korean song arranged by her in the first phase, advancing into the second phase, the final contest.
					
					 She successfully presented world famous music requiring high artistry and rendition in the second phase, winning acclaim of experts and the audience.
					
					 At the end of her playing, members of the jury, music lovers and the audience asked her to repeat playing three times with warm applause. This was something unprecedented.
					
					 At an awarding ceremony held on June 5, she was awarded the special prize and special cup.
					
					 When asked by reporters to give her impressions of the honor of receiving the special prize, she said: "I am very happy to have been able to please the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who loves the children most and brings their talents into full bloom. I'll work harder to become a world famous pianist in the future".

articles.title: Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory Updated
articles.content:
Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory Updated
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory has been rebuilt on a modern basis, reminding visitors of a rest home.
					 The factory is associated with devoted efforts of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who had cared so much for the betterment of the diet of Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Saying that soy and bean paste are indispensable subsidiary food for Koreans, Kim Il Sung had worked heart and soul to put their production on an industrial basis since the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 At an enlarged plenary meeting of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in January Juche 50 (1961), he suggested building a soybean paste and sauce factory in Pyongyang, giving details of it ranging from its scale and equipment to builders. Afterwards, he personally selected the factory site.
					
					 When visiting the factory on November 7, 1968, he made rounds of soy and bean paste production processes, giving important teachings on how to normalize the factory's operation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il took a measure to expand its production capacity, seeing to it that raw materials for the factory's operation were supplied above anything else.
					
					 Even in the days of his foreign tour, he matured a plan to build an up-to-date process of refined table oil production at the factory. In 2010 and 2011, he showed the orientation and ways for installing processes of table oil, seasoning and vitamin E production at the factory and renovating all other production processes.
					
					 All production processes of the rebuilt factory are computerized.
					
					 The factory finished assembling all equipment of the processes in cooperation with Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry and the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences. 
					
					 It boasts of a tele-education room and e-library. 
					
					 Kim Il Nam, rector of Tele-education College of Kim Chaek University of Technology, told KCNA that the college has given scientific and technological lectures to its technicians and workers through the room almost every day.
					
					 The factory has recently succeeded in inventing a new method of saccharizing liquefied enzyme, vital to production of essential foodstuff. 
					
					 When visiting the factory some days ago, supreme leader Kim Jong Un watched a video on its technological updating, saying that the factory helps compare the present with the past and picture what would be in the future to oneself.

articles.title: New Plant Growth Regulator Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Plant Growth Regulator Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Chemical engineers of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK developed a new kind of plant growth regulator, Jungsan-1.
					 This organophosphorous regulator helps shorten the growing period of crops and raise their maturing rate, with a negligible amount of it per hectare. It enhances the crops' resistance to low temperature.
					
					 It was confirmed that the regulator increases per hectare yield of paddy rice 7 to 12 percent, maize 9 to 15, potato 20, bean 15, vegetable 20 and cotton 15.
					
					 The regulator proves more effective when it is applied, mixed with agrochemicals, manure or nutrient solutions. Spraying it some 30 days before harvest can raise the ripening rate over five percent. And chelating it will further enhance its physiological activity.
					
					 As undiluted solution, 10 grams are enough for millet and barley per hectare, 2 grams for rice or maize and 10 to 20 grams for bean.
					
					 The regulator has already been introduced to co-op farms in western areas of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Solidarity, Alliance for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Solidarity, Alliance for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- If the Koreans in the north and the south of Korea, and abroad strengthen the solidarity and alliance for national reunification, regarding the great cause of the nation for national reunification as a more important thing than anything else, departing from seeking their own isms and partisan interests, the path to independent reunification, peace and prosperity will surely be opened, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Tuesday.
					 It says:
					
					 Such solidarity and alliance are a key way of achieving the great unity of the nation and the national reunification.
					
					 The DPRK proposed holding talks between the authorities of the north and the south of Korea and resuming the visits, contacts and cooperation projects among NGOs as well as holding joint national events on the occasion of the June 15 joint declaration in the recent special statement issued by a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea. This reflected the desire and wishes of all the Koreans.
					
					 It is certain that when all the Koreans at home and abroad pool their efforts and energies out of patriotism and achieve solidarity and alliance to take joint actions, radical progress will be made in the cause of independent reunification.
					
					 There is no reason whatsoever for the south Korean authorities to be wary of the solidarity and alliance among the pro-reunification NGOs at home and abroad.
					
					 The visits and exchange among them will, instead, help the authorities of the north and the south resolve knotty problems with ease.
					
					 It is high time that whoever worries about the destiny of the nation and wants the improved inter-Korean relations and the reunification of the country contributed to realizing the nationwide solidarity and alliance.
					
					 Steadfast is the stance of the DPRK to warm the inter-Korean ties through reconciliation and unity of the nation and achieve the peace and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses US Call for "Denuclearization" Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses US Call for "Denuclearization" Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. administration has allotted 537 million U.S. dollars for the modernization of nuclear weapons in Europe from the budget for fiscal 2014, according to the New York Times.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. planned investment of a fabulous amount of money in the modernization of its nukes deployed in Europe is ascribable to the European countries' heated-up debate on the existence and mission of the U.S. nuclear weapons.
					
					 The gravity of U.S. moves is that it sparks off a fresh arms race, harassing world peace and security and making relations between countries complicated.
					
					  Ridiculous is that the U.S. dares brand this or that country as a "nuclear criminal state" at will.
					
					  For a vivid example, although the DPRK has taken just countermeasures for self-defence to cope with nuclear threat from the U.S., the latter has intensified its move to pressurize and stifle the DPRK under the pretext of "provocation" and "threat" while urging Pyongyang to show the "will for denuclearization", "sincere stand" and the like. 
					
					  Washington's sinister intention is to attain its goal after diverting elsewhere the focus of the world community critical of its act of wrecking peace in relevant countries, regions and other parts in the world.
					
					  With no sleight of hand, however, can the U.S. deceive others.
					
					The Obama administration's call for "a world without nuclear weapons" is startlingly at odds with its stepped-up modernization of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The more nuclear threat the U.S. poses, the stronger counteraction it will entail, and the arms race caused by it will bring more miserable end, putting the U.S. at risk.

articles.title: GIs' Crimes during Korean War Denounced
articles.content:
GIs' Crimes during Korean War Denounced
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The royal seal of the Feudal Joson Dynasty, which had disappeared during the June 25 Korean War ignited by the U.S. imperialists, was recently discovered in the U.S.
					 This shows that the U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean nation and freebooters and plunderers, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary. 
					
					 During the Korean War GIs revealed their aggressive nature as plunderers and murderers, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 They used to claim "charity" and "benevolence", but during the war they shouted orders to kill all Koreans irrespective of age and sex. They used to carry bibles in their hands, but they went hell-bent on killing Koreans with arms and guns during the war, putting the Nazi group of Hitler in the shade. 
					
					 When they took to flight from Pyongyang, Yankees destroyed the Pyongyang Museum and plundered exhibits and also took gold Buddha from Yongmyong Temple. Immeasurable are the precious historic artifacts of the Korean nation looted by the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 Their indiscriminate bombings reduced almost all historic relics of Korea to ashes or seriously destroyed them. 
					
					 Theirs in Korea are the most heinous crimes in wanton violation of international law as they breached the law on ground warfare which bans the destruction and plunder of historic relics and artifacts during combat action. 
					
					 The U.S. should admit all the historical crimes it committed against the Korean people and make an apology and full reparation for them.

articles.title: KCNA Denounces Japanese Defense Minister's Remarks for Militarization
articles.content:
KCNA Denounces Japanese Defense Minister's Remarks for Militarization
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese defense minister, addressing a recent Asian security meeting held in Singapore, claimed "north Korea's nuclear and missile development is a threat to peace and security of international community." 
					 He asserted Japan's bolstering of defense capability and the moves to exercise the right to collective self-defense that arouse international concern mean "a contribution to regional stability" whereas the DPRK's nuclear and missile development amounts to a "serious threat to peace and security of the entire international community."
					
					 This is a revelation of the inveterate hostility towards the DPRK and rhetoric to justify the moves to militarize Japan which have entered a full-fledge stage. 
					
					 Japan has never given up its wild ambition for overseas expansion since its defeat, but has steadily put spurs to the moves to turn itself into a military giant. As a result, it has emerged a war force to reckon with. 
					
					 Japan is citing the non-existent "threat" from the DPRK as a pretext for realizing its dangerous goal for turning itself into a military power by taking advantage of the unstable situation on the Korean Peninsula 
					
					 The keynote of Japan's "proposal for defence" for shaping new "defense programme guidelines" calls for exercising the right to collective self-defense, founding a national defense army and acquiring capability for striking missile launching bases. It also calls for studying nuclear deterrence under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK. 
					
					 Japan insists on the above-said assertion because the regional situation remains complicated due to other countries. But, the situation is quite contrary to this assertion. 
					
					 Some time ago, the U.S.-Japan-south Korea joint military drills with the nuclear powered carrier Nimitz involved took place in waters west of Kyushu of Japan. 
					
					 The DPRK and the U.S. are technically at war. Japan's regular involvement in the U.S-south Korea military drills clearly indicates that the exercise of the right to collective self-defence and attack on the enemy's bases touted by Japan are aimed at staging a comeback to Korea according to the joint operations with its allies. 
					
					 The "threat" from the DPRK is what Japan requires for realizing its scenario for overseas expansion. 
					
					 Japan's moves to emerge a military giant not only threaten regional peace but are fraught with a serious danger to itself.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Called for
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Civic organizations of religious circles of south Korea issued a statement on June 9 calling upon all the Koreans to come out for the implementation of the north-south joint declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 It was confirmed in the June 15 joint declaration that peace and reunification are the road to the national prosperity.
					
					 The spirit of the joint declaration should be preserved until the day the country is reunified. 
					
					 The south and the north of Korea earnestly hope that they would exchange and cooperate with each other and become one nation in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Hands and feet disease is spreading in south Korea, according to the south Korean KBS on June 9.
					 The disease blamed on enterovirus is seriously affecting children, sparking off public concern.
					
					 Its typical symptoms are high fever and hives and blister in hands, feet and mouth.
					
					 Children with low immunity including nursing babies can lose their lives if the disease takes a serious turn.
					
					 The epidemic has caused chaos in over 70 places in Tonghae City, Kangwon Province of south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Suppress Doctors
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Suppress Doctors
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The puppet south Korean police kicked off a repressive campaign against doctors active in Pusan and other areas of South Kyongsang Province, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 On June 10, the Pusan District Police Agency conducted a search operation against offices of more than 10 doctors and their houses and the students hall of a medical college in Pusan City.
					
					 The police authorities are staging this campaign on charge of illegally obtaining and reading "enemy-benefiting books" in violation of the "Security Law".

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was inaugurated in Ethiopia on June 3 to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion.

articles.title: Korea Will Surely Be Reunified: Foreign Media
articles.content:
Korea Will Surely Be Reunified: Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk and a Brazilian website on June 3 marked the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The Daily Folk in an article titled "Historic milestone for Korea's reunification" said:
					
					 The publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration in Pyongyang 13 years ago was a landmark event that brought about an epochal turn in the Korean nation's movement for reunification.
					
					 Thanks to its adoption a new era unimaginable in the past was ushered in.
					
					 However, the movement for Korea's reunification faced severe difficulties due to the south Korean conservative group's extreme moves for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration serves as a milestone for Korea's reunification supported and hailed by not only the Korean nation but the world.
					
					 Korea will certainly be reunified under the banner of the joint declaration.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in an article titled "Echo of June 15" posted on its website referred to the validity and vitality of the joint declaration.
					
					 The Korean nation is staging a nationwide struggle to preserve the June 15 joint declaration and bring again the era of peace and prosperity, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean people are denouncing the ruling quarters for pushing the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe, increasing their voices calling for preserving and following through on the joint declaration.
					
					 The international community sincerely hopes that the Korean nation will achieve reunification as early as possible under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and consolidate peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ordena otorgar a Choe Pu Il grado de general de ejercito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ordena otorgar a Choe Pu Il grado de general de ejercito
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, ordeno el dia 10 otorgar el grado de general de ejercito al ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Choe Pu Il.
					 Segun la orden, la institucion de seguridad del pueblo y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo son contingentes armados que forman, junto con el EPC, los pilares gemelos de la revolucion coreana.
					
					 Bajo la bandera de defensa a ultranza al lider, los miembros del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo y los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo realizaron anteriormente grandes meritos, dignos de registrarse para siempre en los anales de la patria, dando pruebas de su abnegacion y espiritu de sacrificio, tanto en los dias gloriosos como en los de pruebas, en la sagrada lucha por defender el partido, el regimen y el pueblo.
					
					 La situacion creada urge que la institucion de seguridad del pueblo y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, defiendan inexpugnablemente el regimen socialista y garanticen con fusiles y por ley la linea del partido de impulsar simultaneamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					  El Mariscal Kim Jong Un expreso la conviccion de que todos los oficiales y soldados de la institucion de seguridad del pueblo y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo apoyaran con fidelidad la direccion del partido y cumpliran con su honrosa mision y deber como centinelas en la primera linea de defensa del regimen socialista.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre minas de provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre minas de provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrio la Mina de Toksong y la Mina Carbonifera Juventud de Kumya de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					Al pasar revista a los campos de excavacion al aire libre, la planta de concentracion, el taller de transporte de carbon, etc. se cercioro en detalles de la cantidad de yacimiento de minerales y carbon, las condiciones de excavacion y la funcion de equipos.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno se debatieron diversos temas para que las unidades vinculadas suministren suficientes materiales, materias primas y electricidad segun la importancia de la mision que ocupan la mencionada mina y la otra carbonifera en la construccion economica y la mejora de vida de los habitantes.
					
					Se tomaron medidas para aumentar la intensidad de ferrocarriles y reducir dias de recorrido de vagones en aras de transportar mucho mas y a tiempo los minerales concentrados y el carbon y elevar la tasa de funcionamiento de equipos de trasporte.
					
					Pak dijo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un exhorto a crear la "velocidad Masikryong" para abrir nuevo periodo dorado en todos los frentes de la construccion socialista y destaco que los funcionarios de las unidades concernientes hagan bien la organizacion de mando y aumenten la produccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a solidaridad y unidad para la reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a solidaridad y unidad para la reunificacion
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que si todos los connacionales del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar fortalecen la solidaridad y la unidad en aras de reunificacion de la patria anteponiendo la gran empresa nacional a las doctrinas, intereses y estrategias partidistas y fraccionalistas, se abrira sin falta el sendero de reunificacion independiente, paz y prosperidad, y continua:
					La solidaridad y la unidad de distintos sectores del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar son el remedio importante para la gran union de la nacion y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Recogiendo la aspiracion y demanda de todos los connacionales, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea propuso, a traves de la reciente declaracion especial del vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, celebrar con motivo del 15 de Junio las conversaciones de autoridades, la visita reciproca, el contacto y las labores de cooperacion entre las entidades civiles y las actividades comunes de la nacion.
					
					Cuando los connacionales se solidaricen y se unan a base de patriotismo coordinando las acciones, se imprimira indudablemente un avance trascendental en el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion independiente.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen ninguna razon para temer la solidaridad y unidad entre las entidades civiles del movimiento por la reunificacion dentro y fuera del pais.
					
					Es que la visita reciproca y el intercambio de ellas pueden contribuir a la solucion espontanea de los problemas dificiles de resolver a nivel de autoridades.
					
					Ahora es cuando los hombres preocupados del destino nacional y deseosos del mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas y de la reunificacion deben contribuir a la solidaridad y unidad de toda la nacion.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la paz y la reunificacion mediante la reconciliacion y la unidad.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia artimana de Japon de justificar campana de militarizacion
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia artimana de Japon de justificar campana de militarizacion
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- En la reunion de seguridad de Asia, recien efectuada en Singapur, el ministro de Defensa de Japon dijo que "el desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte de Corea amenaza gravemente la paz y seguridad de la sociedad internacional".
					Por otra parte, insiste en que el movimiento por fortalecer la capacidad de defensa nacional y ejercer el derecho a la autodefensa colectiva de Japon, que provoca gran preocupacion internacional, "contribuye a la estabilidad de la region". 
					
					Esto es la expresion de la acostumbrada conciencia hostil anti-RPDC y deviene la artimana para justificar la campana de militarizacion en etapa crucial. 
					
					Desde su derrota en la segunda guerra mundial hasta la fecha el pais isleno no ha abandonado ni un dia la ambicion de agresion a ultramar. 
					
					Para ese fin, vino impulsando incesantemente la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar y ya se ha formado como una fuerza de guerra nunca despreciable. 
					
					Habla tanto de la "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para lograr su meta de conversion en la potencia militar aprovechando la situacion inestable de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El llamado "proyecto sobre la defensa" para aprobar el nuevo "programa de defensa" contiene el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa colectiva, la fundacion del ejercito de defensa nacional y la posesion de la capacidad de ataque a las bases de lanzamiento de misil, segun la "enmienda de la constitucion". Tambien incluye la investigacion de la estrategia del disuasivo nuclear pretextando la "amenaza" de alguien. 
					
					Japon insiste en que todo esto es imprescindible para "defender" a si mismo en medio de la situacion complicada de su contorno creada por otros paises, pero la realidad es totalmente opuesta. 
					
					Hace poco, en la zona maritima al oeste de Kyushu, Japon, se desplego el simulacro conjunto tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea con la participacion del portaaviones nuclear Nimitz.
					
					Japon participa regularmente en los ejercicios militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, que estan en estado beligerante con la RPDC, lo cual insinua que el derecho a la autodefensa colectiva y el ataque a las bases enemigas de que habla tanto el pais isleno tienen en cuenta la nueva agresion a la RPDC segun las operaciones combinadas con los paises aliados. 
					
					La "amenaza" de alguien es necesaria para Japon que se entrega con frenesi a la realizacion de su ambicion de agresion a ultramar. 
					
					La conversion de Japon en potencia militar pondra en peligro la paz  regional y  llevara a si mismo muchos peligros
